children: Algorithm for diagnosis of patients with CAD. MPI = myocardial perfusion imaging; TID = transient ischemic dilation.
Intermediate pretest probability (likelihood) is variably defined as between 10% and 90% or between 25% and 75%.
Stress testing in patients with high pretest probability may be used to obtain prognostic information, but the results should not affect the initiation of optimal medical therapy.
Preferred in patients aged 65 years and older or those with a high suspicion of obstructive CAD.
Preferred in patients younger than 65 years or those with a lower suspicion of obstructive CAD.
In a proximal or middle coronary artery segment.
